class.name: PLATEAUDatasetGroup
class.brief_description: Group of PLATEAU datasets (typically represents a prefecture).
class.description: PLATEAUDatasetGroup contains a collection of datasets, typically grouped by prefecture.

method.name: get_dataset_count
method.description: Returns the number of datasets in this group.

method.name: get_dataset
method.description: Returns the dataset at the specified index.

members.member: Array of datasets in this group.
